fields.description: I skipped doing the actual email attachment implementation since it wasn't necessary for corporate directory and was more involved than the rest of the impl. We need to cast the JSObject to Blob or File in TitaniumKit and call to overloaded addAttachment methods for either, and then do the actual hooking up to the email message in open().
